lead_paragraph: Olivier Giroud has been restricted to the role of substitute in the Premier League this season and while Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger knows the striker is far from happy with the situation he is channelling his anger in the right way.

headline.print_headline: Wenger Hoping to Harness Super Sub Giroud's Anger
headline.main: Wenger Hoping to Harness Super Sub Giroud's Anger

snippet: Olivier Giroud has been restricted to the role of substitute in the Premier League this season and while Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger knows the striker is far from happy with the situation he is channelling his anger in the right way....
